item.title: Corbin add a quote by Frank Lloyd Wright
item.description: "Television is chewing gum for the eyes." -- Frank Lloyd Wright

item.title: Corbin add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
Corbin add a quote by Mario Puzo
item.description: "I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse." -- Mario Puzo

item.title: Corbin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Corbin add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "We can't stop here, this is bat country!" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Corbin add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Every now and then when your life gets complicated and the weasels start closing in, the only cure is to load up on heinous chemicals and then drive like a bastard from Hollywood to Las Vegas ... with the music at top volume and at least a pint of ether." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Corbin add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "We were somewhere around Barstow, on the edge of the desert, when the drugs began to take hold." -- Hunter S. Thompson
